oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Globaliseringen og økologiske fødevarer
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Knudsen, Marie Trydeman
Kristensen, Erik Steen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The presentation discusses recent trends of globalization within organic food and farming in relation to the challanges, prospects and principles of organic farming. Furthermore selected results from DARCOF II are presented.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Knudsen, Marie Trydeman and Kristensen, Erik Steen (2006) Globaliseringen og økologiske fødevarer. [Globalization and organic agricultural products.] Speech at: Årsmøde i Økologiudvalget for Landbrugsrådgivning Syd, Rødding Højskole, 7. marts 2006.
